    • addMovieGoer

      public void addMovieGoer(String Username, String Password, String Name, String Email, String Phone, HashMap<Entity.Movie,Entity.Review_Ratings> PostedReviewsList, ArrayList<Entity.Booking> BookingList)
      Function to add in a new movie goer.
      Parameters:
      Username - This Moviegoer's username.
      Password - This Moviegoer's password.
      Name - This Moviegoer's name.
      Email - This Moviegoer's email.
      Phone - This Moviegoer's phone number.
      PostedReviewsList - This Moviegoer's movie review list.
      BookingList - This Moviegoer's movie booking list.

      obj - The object that will update the moviegoer's choice.
